document.full_text: toys r us  has agreed to pay a $1.3 million penalty for violating a 1998 order that barred it from pushing suppliers to refuse to sell to competitors or from urging limits to those sales, the federal trade commission said on tuesday.
document.title: toys r us to pay $1.3 million for violating ftc order
lines_and_colors: toys r us  has agreed to pay a $1.3 million penalty for violating a 1998 order that barred it from pushing suppliers to refuse to sell to competitors or from urging limits to those sales, the federal trade commission said on tuesday.
